p: The chemicals used for the present study were ethanol, ascorbic acid, acetyl salicylic acid, DPPH purchased from Merck KGaA, (Darmstadt, Germany), streptokinase (Incepta Pharmaceutics Ltd., Dhaka, Bangladesh), diclofenac sodium (ACME Laboratories Ltd., Dhaka, Bangladesh), paracetamol (Square Pharmaceuticals Ltd., Dhaka, Bangladesh), vincristine sulphate (Beacon Pharmaceuticals Ltd., Dhaka, Bangladesh) and others chemicals were organized from local trader through Taj Scientific Ltd, Chittagong, Bangladesh.
